duties_responsibilities.duty: Lead and manage clinical trial projects, ensuring compliance with client and regulatory requirements.
Oversee the start-up and execution of clinical activities, communicating project objectives and status updates.
Monitor the quality of clinical deliverables, address quality issues, and identify metrics for improvement.
Provide project oversight and leadership for clinical deliverables, coordinating with cross-functional teams and sponsors.
Manage project finance, including time entry guidelines, budget monitoring, and escalation of issues.
Interface with functional leads, vendors, and clients to ensure clinical monitoring outcomes are achieved.
Contribute to business development activities and participate in client meetings.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's Degree in health-related field from an accredited institution; licensed health-care professional (i.e., registered nurse); or equivalent work experience.
